name: "Old Skool Arkade" by Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
description: [Digital drawing created on my phone!] The lights, the smell, the NOISE... Retro arcades (when the weren't quite RETRO yet) were the PLACE TO BE! This is my digital tribute (another one) to the joys of '80's arcade culture! ---Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
